title: How to earn money from home using the internet - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve been making money on the internet full time for the last 6 years, I’d be happy to help. It took a few years to figure out what works and what was a scam. IMPORTANT: I now focus on just 3 online business models, and make over $1M per year… (Crazy what happens when you focus on what works). Before getting to the answer, it’s really important to understand the following: Making money online keeps us truthful, the numbers will never lie. If you put in the work, you will make money, if you don't put in the work, you won't make money. The amount you make is in relation to the amount of work you’re willing to put in. I’ll show you 10 ways that I currently make money online (all within the 3 online business models), that you can start without spending money. Also, I’ll show you 10 ways that I do not recommend for making money online. You don’t need to buy any courses, or have any specific skills to get started. Additionally, you don't need to sell anyone anything! With that said, I’ll list the categories below, then I’ll attach a video to explain the categories broken down into 10 specific websites. Categories Print On-Demand: Creating simple, catchy, funny, or even text only, designs that are uploaded to websites that offer that design to be printed on clothing items and accessories. You create the designs (with design apps) and upload them to the big print on-demand websites, then they create virtual listings of your ‘products’, and market them for you. Then when someone order an item, the website prints the item with the design on it, ships it to the customer, and handles all customer service. They take a split of the profit, and you get the rest. [How To Video] Affiliate Marketing: Creating reviews, comparisons, articles, about products or services, then linking the reader/viewer to the product where they can purchase it, and the company who sells the product will give you a commission for referring the person. [How To Video] Information Products: Creating online courses, or ebooks, to share your knowledge on a specific topic, and selling it digitally around the world. You only have to create the online course, or ebook, one time and you can sell it time-and-time again digitally. Rather than writing a novel for you, here’s a video to explain 10 best websites you can use to start making money online, without spending money.  Additionally, here’s a similar video with the 10 ways that I do not recommend for making money online:

Don’t whether it is possible to earn cash online. Certainly, you can earn money that is deposited into a bank account that you can use later on. There are lots of ways to make money online. Just find the sweet spot where ALL of the following six criteria intersects: You are so passionate about the money making idea that you will spend ALL your free time working on it (even on weekends!).You want to create value for people and desire to make a difference in their lives.You have willing or desperate customers wanting to pay you for your work because you can solve their pain points or problems.You can create a sustainable living out of that money making idea when you do decide to quit your 9-to-5 job – Remember always that you have to pay your bills!You have the relevant skills and experience to perform the side gig without much re-skilling or learning.You want to align yourself with your religious beliefs. Here’s a seven-step process to explore some suitable business ideas, selecting that one idea that potentially sells, and making that idea work for you. Step 1 – You brainstorm and select your proposed business idea.Step 2 – Develop an overall strategy for making money. This step requires you to determine your money making criteria and meeting those criteria. You will need to update your strategy as you gather more information. Remember that people don’t plan to fail, they fail to plan.Step 3 – Acquire or develop a product (e.g., e-Books, tools, coaching services, training, etc) that will help solve your target customers’ problem. The aim is to sell a relevant product to your customers and make money. Test out your proposed product by converting it into a minimum viable product.Step 4 – Identify the best platforms and established marketplaces (e.g., eBay, Facebook, blogs, etc.) where the majority of your target customers hang out so that you can sell them your proposed product.Step 5 – Validate your minimum viable product with your customers using these established marketplaces.Step 6 – Work hard to market and drive Internet traffic to your chosen platforms so that you can convert your visitors into leads and thereafter transforming them into paying customers.Step 7 – Depending on your testing results, you could scale-up selling this product with your own website, find another new product to sell, or ditch the product altogether.There are no get rich quick schemes to follow. There is no button to press and money comes pouring in. Everything requires significant effort and perseverance. Just do it and never give up! It takes hard work to earn money. . There are more than 500+ ideas to make money online and offline. Here’s a partial listing. .  .
